Chosen Contacts 

Chosen Contact 1 and Chosen Contact 2 will be the contacts when in an emergency the SMS will be sent. Emergency sms will be contained your last known location as a GPS location.

Time Allocator

This function will automatically send the emergency SMS to your contacts if you did not respond in a specified time. This function is helpful when you are feel a threat about the vehicle you are traveling.

 How to use

 • Select an appopriate time that you will think may need to your journey.
 • Touch the Start button. A notification will appear on the notification bar indicating that the service is running.
 • You may can deactivate the service at any time by touching the notification and giving the password.
 • Before the end of time (40 seconds before) the phone will vibrate and ask for your responce. You must respond by your password.
 • If you fail to respond the application will wait another 20 seconds for your response.
 • After that if no response from the user the application will automatically start sending your GPS location to your chosen contacts.

Averse Destination

This function can be used when you do not know the specific location about the destination. This function will automatically alert you if the path of the cab service averse by the destination path.

 How to use

 • Select the destination you are travelling to from the drop down list.
 • The averse destination service will start automatically and will be indicated on the notification bar..
 • You may can deactivate the service at any time by touching the notification and giving the password.
 • If the destination is diverted a dialog will apear with choices to user.
 • You can either ignore and continue, show in the map or send your location to the chosen contacts.

Police Station Details

Details of the Colombo area police stations will be displayed with there contacts numbers in order to gat easily when in an emergency situation.


Shake Detector

Shake detector is a automatic emegency SMS sender when the user shakes the mobile device. This can be used whenever the user wants to act quickly without accesing the mobile device s data.

 How to use

 • Activate the service by touching on Shake Detector and giving option ON.
 • A notification will be appeared on the notification bar indicating that the function is running.
 • User can deactivate the function any time using the notification and the password.
 • When ever the user feels a life threat user only needs to shake the mobile device and the emergency SMS will be sent using user s GPS location.

Emergency SMS\n
Emegerncy SMS will contain the user s current location obtained by GPS or mobile data. After starting this service the Emergency SMS will be sent to both chosen contacts 5 mins apart for 2 hours. User can deactivate this service any time by providing his password.\n
